description: The Steam Open World Survival Crafting Fest is live now showing off demos, discounts, upcoming games and much more in another event that will swallow up your time.
title: Steam's Open World Survival Crafting Fest is live now

description: While we only recently had the Zelda 64: Recompiled release, we've now also got another PC port of Zelda: Majora's Mask thanks to the Harbour Masters team with 2 Ship 2 Harkinian.
title: 2 Ship 2 Harkinian, another unofficial PC port of Zelda: Majora's Mask is out now

description: The Rogue Prince of Persia is now in Early Access on Steam, and the good news is that it should already work well on Steam Deck but the developer plans to keep improving it. So that's good news for desktop Linux players too.
title: The Rogue Prince of Persia arrives on Steam, devs will "constantly" improve it on Steam Deck

description: Released on May 3rd, Cozy Space Survivors is a cute survival roguelite in space, one for those of you who don't have a lot of free time. It's a little gem and the developer has posted up some post-release thoughts.
title: The Cozy Space Survivors post-release update has some simple lessons for indie devs

description: Remember Besiege from 2020? A physics building game about constructing mechanical machines to annihilate armies, obliterate castles and overcome challenging obstacles. Well, now you can go sailing in it.
title: Besiege: The Splintered Sea is out now with a free major sound system update

description: Another new laptop is on the way with the TUXEDO Stellaris Slim 15, the second revealed in the 6th generation of new Stellaris laptops from TUXEDO.
title: TUXEDO Stellaris Slim 15 revealed for high performance in a small package

description: This is a compilation series from the last updates provided at the Veloren blog, the free and open source voxel action-adventure RPG.
title: Free & open source RPG 'Veloren' update compilation - weeks 229 to 232
